headline: Ex-Interpol Chief Gets 13-Year Prison Term in China for Bribery
abstract: Meng Hongwei, once a high-ranking Chinese police official, was sentenced to 13 and a half years. His wife has said he is the victim of a political vendetta.
lead_paragraph: BEIJING â€” A former senior Chinese police official who also served as president of Interpol was sentenced on Tuesday to 13 and a half years in prison for bribery, in a case that his wife has denounced as stemming from a political vendetta.
